title: Russia faces global outrage over bodies in Ukraine's streets - The Associated Press
content:
1. Russia faces global outrage over bodies in Ukraine's streets  The Associated Press
  2. Global outcry against Russia escalates as horrifying stories emerge of Ukraine atrocities  Fox News
  3. Explainer: How could Russia's Putin be prosecuted for war crimes in Ukraine?  Reuters.com
  4. Opinion | Bucha, Ukraine, massacre marks turning point in Russia's war  The Washington Post
  5. Editorial: The carnage in Bucha was evil. Its architect, Vladimir Putin, must be held accountable.  Chicago Tribune
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: BUCHA, Ukraine (AP) â€” Moscow faced global revulsion and accusations of war crimes Monday after the Russian pullout from the outskirts of Kyiv revealed streets, buildings and yards strewn with corpses  of what appeared to be civilians, many of them evidently killed at close range.
